[After running a new _Ostrea lurida_ assembly yesterday (`Olurida_v090`)](https://robertslab.github.io/sams-notebook/posts/2021/2021-05-20-Genome-Assembly-Olurida_v090-with-BGI-Illumina-and-PacBio-Hybrid-Using-Wengan-on-Mox.html), I evaluated `Olurida_v090` using [Quast](http://quast.sourceforge.net/quast) to produce some stats. This was run on my local computer with the following command:/

```shell
python \
/home/sam/programs/quast-5.0.2/quast.py \
--threads=20 \
--min-contig=100 \
--labels Olurida_v090 \
/home/sam/data/O_lurida/genomes/Olur_v090.SPolished.asm.wengan.fasta
```
